"特定のクライアントオーダーのクリア": "特定のクライアントオーダーのクリア"
"スーパーハード受注許可証の所持"

"This portal will allow you to take part in a training exercise related to an upcoming battle. This Trigger will let you recreate the battle at Craiano Cliffs in Western Aelio. Use all your skills to annihilate the enemies, including the large Formers.

※Selling or storing all applicable Triggers will cancel this Quest."
